attributes.action: Allow people who object to screening by full body scanners to use an alternative screening method.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Air passengers who are selected for screening with full body scanners are refused boarding if they refuse to submit to the scan. They are not offered an alternative screening method.  

This means that people with rational objections to being scanned in this way are effectively barred from flying.  It impact their ability to visit family and friends abroad, and to undertake employment that requires them to travel by air.

This is an unreasonable restriction on people's conscience and movement.
